animeDescription: The monkeys are up to no good again, but this time they're on the "heroes" side. Performing no good magic shows, cloning themselves with a ninja Jutsu and filling UFO catchers with themselves are just a few of the tricks they're pulling, while at the same time trying to adapt themselves to the human lifestyle.
animeRelated: ['Alternative version: Saru Getchu: On Air', 'Side story: Saru Getchu Movie: Ougon no Pipo Helmet - Ukki Battle', 'Prequel: Letchu, Getchu, Saru Getchu Episode 0']
